mapper.select: select * from idle_info where info_id = #{infoId} for update
select idle.*, student.user_name,student.user_icon,student.credit,student.student_id from idle_info idle left join student on (idle.user_id = student.user_id) where info_id = #{infoId}

select count(idle_info.info_id) from idle_info left join classify on (idle_info.classify_id = classify.classify_id) where
status = 100
status not in (100,101)
